divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were driving north on Rose in Yorba Linda. When I noticed a meteor like object in the sky. I thought it was a meteor. Another appeared soon after I noticed the first. I then thought it might be a satellite entering earth orbit. They both seemed to burn out the reignite at different intervals. They both left a fire trail as a meteor would. They also changed direction. They appeared to be going in circle for a little bit. My girlfriend says that one object appeared triangular. We watched them for about 3 minutes. They then burned out or just went beyond our field of view.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brea
There were 3 other sightings in Brea on or around January 26th 2008
Summary: meteor like to me. Triangular to my girlfriend
